metadata.title: CVE-2020-1751 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: An out-of-bounds write vulnerability was found in glibc before 2.31 whenhandling signal trampolines on PowerPC. Specifically, the backtracefunction did not properly check the array bounds when storing the frameaddress, resulting in a denial of service or potential code execution. Thehighest threat from this vulnerability is to system availability.

criterions.comment: eglibc: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
